mapper.select:
select tod.ID as orderdetailsId,tod.VERSION,NOWDATE,tod.VIRTUALGOODSID,RETURNCODE,
LITRE,STATIONCODE,COUPONAMOUNT,REQUESTID,ORDERNUM,REALAMOUNT,OILCODE,ORDER_DEAL as orderDeal,
DISCOUNTAMOUNT,CARDUSERID,AMOUNT,OILPRICE,TERMNUM,SENDTIME,INVOICETITLE,
MEMBERNO,VIRTUALGOODSIDS,tcu.Customer_Id as customerId,tod.PPSORDERNUMBER,
tod.GOODSAMOUNT,tod.FUELCOUPONAMOUNT,tod.GOODCOUPONAMOUNT,tod.GOODSCOUPONAMOUNT,tod.UPDATEREALAMOUNT,
tod.FULECOUPONAMOUNT,tod.FULEAMOUNT,tod.CARLICENSE,tod.OILGUNNO,tod.ORDER_STATE,tod.EPSCODE
from BJSHELL.TBL_ORDERDETAILS tod left join BJSHELL.TBL_CARDUSER tcu on
tod.carduserid=tcu.id where tod.ID>=#{min} and tod.ID<#{max}
